participant_2.background: I currently suffer from social anxiety. I watch every football game at alabama. I am a geology major at alabama university. I have a girlfriend of 7 years. I never have had alcohol in my life.

content.text: I'm a vegetarian. I take the subway to work everyday. Every fall I visit my sister in Canada. I have four cats.
I currently suffer from social anxiety. I watch every football game at Alabama. I am a geology major at Alabama University. I have a girlfriend of 7 years. I never have had alcohol in my life.
That's cool. I've never been to Canada. What's it like there?
It's beautiful! The scenery is amazing. I love going hiking there.
That sounds really nice. I'd love to go there sometime.
You should! It's worth the trip.
Well, if you do, I know a great place to stay.
Oh, that's good to know. Thanks!
So, what's it like being a geology major?
It's really interesting! I love learning about the earth and how it works.
That's cool. I'm not sure what I want to do with my life yet.
You have time to figure it out. Just keep exploring your interests and you'll find something you're passionate about.
